comments.body: Nice! Thanks for remembering this :)  Oh, I think you just copied this from below!

Yes, moved it up so I could use them for the templating of the value sooner, and I figured it was inside the if block anyway so it was most likely going to be tagged for work and there wasn't any major performance reduction in doing it sooner.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +127,131 @@                        task_vars = self._variable_manager.get_vars(play=iterator._play, host=host, task=task,
                                                                    _hosts=self._hosts_cache,
                                                                    _hosts_all=self._hosts_cache_all)
                        self.add_tqm_variables(task_vars, play=iterator._play)
                        templar = Templar(loader=self._loader, variables=task_vars)
